Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at Woodlawn/93rd
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove and resume regular route: due to, street blockage near Woodlawn/93rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove and resume regular route: due to, street blockage near Woodlawn/93rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Garfield
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Garfield due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Garfield due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
